about_the_game:
Welcome to the delightful world of cheese! Milky Mouse is a fun and relaxing casual puzzle game suitable for players of all ages. In this game, your task is to throw cheese at mice and help them enjoy a tasty treat. With simple controls and creative level designs, you'll experience a unique blend of fun and challenge!

Gameplay

In Milky Mouse, your goal is to aim at the mice on the screen and swipe to control the direction and power of your cheese throw. Each level presents different obstacles and challenges, such as spinning barriers, moving targets, and maze-like terrains. Mastering the art of physics and cleverly avoiding obstacles are key to success!

Features

Simple Controls: Easy-to-learn swipe mechanics make the game accessible for everyone.

Varied Levels: From beginner-friendly tutorials to highly challenging levels, the fun never ends.

Charming Visuals: Cartoon-style mice and cheese with beautifully crafted backgrounds.

Realistic Physics: A precise physics engine simulates the cheese's parabolic flight.

Family-Friendly Fun: Perfect for kids and adults to enjoy together.
